summary: Completed comprehensive end-to-end testing of Anurag Tewari's personal website. Both backend APIs and frontend functionality tested thoroughly. The website is working excellently with all core features functional.
passed_tests: All 15 backend API endpoints working (100% success rate)
Homepage loads with all sections (Hero, About, Decision Quality, AI Preview, Investing Preview, Newsletter, Contact)
Navigation links functional (Home, AI Insights, Investing Insights)
Newsletter form submission works and integrates with backend
Contact form submission works and integrates with backend
AI Insights page loads and displays seeded articles correctly
Investing Insights page loads with disclaimer and seeded articles
Individual insight detail pages render content properly
Back navigation from detail pages works
Newsletter scroll functionality works from hero section
All backend data persistence working (MongoDB integration)
Insight seeding functionality works (6 sample insights created)
Category filtering works (AI vs Investing insights)
